mapper.select: select p_no, p_name, p_dogbreed, p_unique, p_gender, p_weight, p_picture from Pet_tbl order by p_no desc
select p_no, p_name, p_dogbreed, p_unique, p_gender, p_weight, p_picture from Pet_tbl where p_no=#{p_no}
mapper.insert: insert into Pet_tbl( p_no, p_picture, p_name, p_dogbreed, p_gender, p_weight, p_unique ) values( #{p_no}, #{p_picture}, #{p_name}, #{p_dogbreed}, #{p_gender}, #{p_weight}, #{p_unique} )
